step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to feel that gentle resistance to help pump the lymph.
You are opening your hand and fingers wide. Keep up the good work!
You are making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. This is great for pumping lymph.
You are opening your hand and relaxing your muscles while exhaling. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm overhead, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. Then, open your hand as you breathe out to help move fluid.
